name: Yasma
appearance: Copper-skinned matron with riverline wrinkles and a palm that weighs coins and favors alike. Wears prismatic salt charms at her throat.
character: Sharp-tongued and calculating; she never forgets a debt and rarely forgives a slight.
talents: Hearing lies by the pauses between words
Turning rivals against each other with a shrug
Choosing the right gift at the right moment
flaws: Pride blinds her to new tides
Underestimates river faith when it rises
dreams: Secure her family's seat for three generations
Replace colored brine with glass counters under Collegium terms
Keep bread steady and streets quiet through any storm
secrets: Uses the hidden mix room beneath the basins to test false hues
Keeps a ledger of Warden stipends in arrears as leverage
Once paid the Black Net to sink a vote quietly
